column4: I installed Nvidia glx and settings but when I run glx enable it says just change nv to nvidia in xorg---why is this even there why does all the instructions say enable glx?
anyway I updated kernel to 686 --- and installed glx and got a big speed improvement in gnome it seems
nvidia don't allow free software developers to make free software drivers for their 3D
thus there are lots of rough edges trying to get their proprietary drivers into the free software
